title: Welcome to Indira Shiva Rao Polytechnic
description: Indira Shiva Rao Polytechnic is an institution run by Sri Krishna Shikshana Prathisthana Trust, Sri Krishnapura Mutt, Car Street, Udupi, Under the able guidance of Sri Sri Vidyasagara Theertha Swamiji, who is the President of the Trust.
description2: The polytechnic started functioning in the year 1997 as the first and only Private Womenâ€™s Polytechnic in the entire undivided Dakshina Kannada district. Due to popular demand from the parents for admission of boys, it was subsequently converted into a co-ed polytechnic in the year 1999.
RECOGNITION: Indira Shiva Rao Polytechnic offers Engineering Diploma course of 3 years (6 Semesters) duration, which has been recognized by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and the institute is affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Bengaluru.
Recognitiondescription: The Board of Technical Examinations (BTE), Bengaluru under Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Govt. of Karnataka conducts all the exams and issues Diploma certificates at the end of the course.
